directions: In a bowl whisk together the vinegar, the gingerroot, the tamari or soy sauce, the sugar, the sesame oil, the red pepper flakes, and the vegetable oil until the dressing is combined well. Add the cucumber, the melon, and the scallions, toss the salad until it is combined well, and sprinkle it with the sesame seeds.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Asian (toasted) sesame oil, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes, or to taste
1 seedless cucumber, halved lengthwise and slice thin (about 2 cups)
1 tablespoon sesame seeds, toasted lightly and cooled
title: Honeydew and Cucumber Salad with Sesame
